amendment.description: Amendment directed the Secretary of Homeland Security to assess, within 30 days of enactment, the enrollment sites for transportation security cards, including the feasibility of keeping them open for longer durations and the quality of their customer service and application processing times.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 110-604 to direct the Secretary of Homeland Security to assess, within 30 days of enactment, the enrollment sites for transportation security cards, including the feasibility of keeping them open for longer durations and the quality of their customer service and application processing times.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
